00055 /* Amount of error allowed to consider a movement "over"
00056  * In cartesian motion units (0.022 mm)
00057  */

00073 int sign(int n)
00074 {
00075     return ((n >= 0) ? 1 : -1);
00076 }
00077 
00078 float sign(float n)
00079 {
00080     return ((n >= 0) ? 1.0f : -1.0f);
